title: Playing around with a narrow scope of reality
author: VD
content_html: Congratulations to the Original Cyberpunk, who this weekend launched the inaugural title in his new ebook-only original anthology series. I am one of the contributors to the October issue, which appropriately features a dark and spectral theme. For more details about the first issue of Stupefying Stories, go to the Black Gate.
content_text:
Congratulations to
the Original Cyberpunk
, who this weekend launched the inaugural title in his new ebook-only original anthology series.  I am one of the contributors to the October issue, which appropriately features a dark and spectral theme.  For more details about the first issue of
Stupefying Stories
, go to
the Black Gate
.
